data.title: VILLAGE COMMUNITY SCHOOL
data.meta_description: A relative newcomer as compared to New York's illustrious private schools, Village Community School has firmly established itself as a leading modern alternative for discerning parents seeking a diverse refreshing approach to education. Make no mistake, however, VCS is still all you would expect for an independent school preparing pupils for entry into the top…
data.text:
A relative newcomer as compared to New York’s illustrious private schools, Village Community School has firmly established itself as a leading modern alternative for discerning parents seeking a diverse refreshing approach to education. Make no mistake, however, VCS is still all you would expect for an independent school preparing pupils for entry into the top tier of private secondary college-preparatory schools.

___________

Independent Private Kindergarten, Elementary and Middle Preparatory School

Established: 1970

Gender: Co-educational

Ages: 2-14 (grades K-8)

Ethos: Non-denominational

Attendance: Day school

Head of School: Ms Denise Frazier

Enrollment: 358 pupils

Faculty: 45 staff

Ratio: 8:1

Average class size: 20 pupils

Tuition fees: US$49,900 per annum

Scholarships / bursaries / financial aid: Discretionary Tuition Assistance scheme

Endowment: US$7.5 million

Mascot: N/A

School Colours:

Uniform: Casual

Alumni: VCS Graduates

Accreditations: New York State Association of Independent Schools

Associations: New York Interschool

Affiliations:

Athletics Conference: Downtown Independent School Community

Feeder schools: N/A

Rival schools: N/A

___________

A: 272-278 West 10th Street, Manhattan, New York City, New York, United States

T: +12126915146

E: vcsmailings@vcs-nyc.org

W: vcsnyc.org

___________

See also: New York Interschool
